Html:
Can someone please help this frustrated Novice?
 I am using Windows 2013 and cannot find the MSWord files to download BibWord or Extentender into.  Incredibly, Incredibly, Incredibly Frustrating to say the least.  I have used the folder names of the "How To" section and tried multiple times to map them out but to no avail.  MS Search Tools is useless.   I did manage to find a file entitled "MSOffice15" but I cannot seem to find the MSWord system files at all.
 If anyone has a suggestion or a solution, I am all ears/eyes!!
Frustrated User

I'm assuming you mean 'Office 2013' by 'Windows 2013'. There is no point in putting them in the MSOffice15 folder.

Open Explorer (Windows key + E) and paste the following in the top bar 
%userprofile%\AppData\Roaming
followed by an enter. That should get you to a directory.

Go down the directory structure Microsoft => Bibliography => Style. If one of those subdirectories does not exist, create it.

Put the files in the Style directory.
